articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Ukraine confirms 1st engagement with North Korea troops: South Korea media - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Ukrainian defense minister tells broadcaster KBS of 'small-scale' engagement
articles.content: SEOUL (Kyodo) -- Ukrainian Defense Minister Rustem Umerov has confirmed his country's military has engaged for the first time with North Korean troops, South Korea's public broadcaster KBS reported T… [+312 chars]
